delete_modal.logout_text: You will be logged out of your account and will need to sign in again.

home.notification_password_description: Currently you can log in only via a social network. For convenience, set a password in your profile settings.

inventory.title: Inventory
inventory.failed_to_get: Failed to load inventory. Please try again later.

items.title: Inventory Items
items.like_failed: Couldn’t add like. Please try again.
items.unlike_failed: Couldn’t remove like. Please try again.
items.delete_failed: Failed to delete items. Try again later!

access.title: Inventory Access
access.status_error: Failed to update inventory status. Try again later..
access.invite_error: Failed to invite user. Try again later!

discussion.title: Inventory Discussion
discussion.failed_to_post_comment: Failed to post a comment. Try again later..

profile.delete_account_modal_title: Do you really want to delete your account?
profile.delete_account_modal_text: This action cannot be undone. All your account data, including inventories, will be permanently deleted.
profile.account_deleted_text: Account deleted successfully. Taking you to the Home page..
profile.account_deleted_error_text: Failed to delete your account! Try again later..

user_inventories.title: Inventories you are part of
user_inventories.failed_to_load: Failed to load inventories you're participating in!
user_inventories.failed_to_load_more: Failed to load more inventories! Try again later..
user_inventories.failed_to_leave_inventories: Failed to leave inventories. Try again later.
user_inventories.successfully_left_inventories: You have left the selected inventories!
user_inventories.leave_inventories_tooltip: You will permanently leave these inventories and lose access to them.

user_invitations.title: Invitations
user_invitations.accept_tooltip: Accepting invite you will be added to these inventories
user_invitations.reject_tooltip: Rejecting invite you will need to ask the creator to send you invitation again
user_invitations.failed_to_reject_invitations: Failed to reject selected invitations! Try again later!
user_invitations.failed_to_accept_invitations: Failed to accept selected invitations! Try again later!

profile_settings.title: Profile settings
profile_settings.text: Real-time information and activies of your account.
profile_settings.password_min: Password must be at least 6 characters.
profile_settings.password_same: New password cannot be the same as the old one.
profile_settings.update_fail: Something went wrong while updating your profile. Please try again later!
profile_settings.wrong_name: You did not change your name!
profile_settings.delete_avatar_text: This will permanently remove your profile picture.
profile_settings.delete_avatar_success: Your profile picture has been successfully deleted.
profile_settings.delete_avatar_fail: Failed to delete your profile picture. Please try again later.

inventories_new.upload_image_text: Click or drag file to this area to upload
inventories_new.drag_drop_hint: Support for a single upload. Only PNG, JPG, JPEG files.
inventories_new.status_tooltip_private: Visible only to you and specific people you invite.
inventories_new.status_tooltip_public: Visible to everyone on the platform.
inventories_new.created_successfully: Inventory has been created successfully, taking you to the inventory page..
inventories_new.creating_error: An error occurred while creating the inventory. Please try again later.
